mapper.select: SELECT il.id,il.field_1 personName,idd.name personSex,il.field_3 personSexId,il.field_4 personTelephone, id.name personDuties,il.field_2 personDutiesId, ids.name education FROM information_listdata il LEFT JOIN information_dictionary id ON il.field_2=id.id LEFT JOIN information_dictionary ids ON il.field_5=ids.id LEFT JOIN information_dictionary idd on il.field_3=idd.id where il.project_id=#{projectId} and il.id=#{id}

select il.id id, il.field_1 endTime, il.field_2 GraduateSchool, il.field_3 profession, id.name education, il.field_5 startTime FROM information_listdata il LEFT JOIN information_dictionary id ON il.field_4=id.id WHERE il.project_id=#{projectId} AND il.code=#{code1} and il.parent_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into information_listdata ( id, project_id, title_id, parent_id, code, field_1, field_2, field_3, field_4, field_5, field_6, field_7, field_8, field_9, field_10, is_valid, created_time, create_id, updated_time, update_id ) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{titleId}, #{parentId}, #{code}, #{personName}, #{personDuties}, #{personSex}, #{personTelephone}, #{education}, #{field6}, #{field7}, #{field8}, #{field9}, #{field10}, #{isValid}, #{createdTime}, #{createId}, #{updateTime}, #{updateId} )
mapper.delete: delete from information_listdata where id = #{id} and project_id=#{projectId}
